snippet: The Swiss lensman’s new book, “Jours Blancs,” takes its name from a skiers’ term for days when visibility is reduced due to fog — but it’s more than just a study in white.
abstract: The Swiss lensman’s new book, “Jours Blancs,” takes its name from a skiers’ term for days when visibility is reduced due to fog — but it’s more than just a study in white.

headline.main: The Photographer François Schaer Hits the Slopes
